prod_short_desc: Dig your way through the multiverse as DC Comics™ villain, Bane™!
prod_long_desc:
Broaden your LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ gameplay with the buildable Bane™ Fun Pack. Place the iconic villain on the LEGO® Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his many super-human powers to solve puzzles and overcome villains. Add the 3-in-1 Drill Driver to boost your gameplay, and rebuild it into a Bane Dig ‘n Drill and the Bane Drill ‘n Blast for upgraded in-game abilities. This set includes a buildable Bane minifigure with his venom tank.
Includes a buildable Bane™ minifigure with his venom tank and 3-in-1 Drill Driver, both with a detachable LEGO® Toy Tag.
Rebuild the 3-in-1 Drill Driver into a Bane™ Dig ‘n Drill and Bane Drill ‘n Blast for new in-game vehicle abilities.
Place Bane™ and his 3-in-1 vehicle on the LEGO® Toy Pad and set out on exciting in-game adventures.
Activate his Hazard Protection, Big Transform and Super Strength abilities to solve puzzles and overpower enemies.
Collect your favorite LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and use them in-game together for a crazy mash-up multiverse.
Visit LEGO.com/DIMENSIONS for more information on this exciting LEGO® building and video-gaming experience. Ask your parents' permission before going online.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ Starter Pack and internet connection required.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ expansion packs unlock additional content.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and vehicles are required to interact with the LEGO DIMENSIONS video game.
Drill Driver measures over1” high, 2” long and 1” wide (alternative 3-in-1 vehicle builds vary in size).
